text: James Poole (29 January 1804 – 14 March 1886) was a landscape painter of Ecclesall Manor House, Sheffield, West Riding of Yorkshire, England. He was born in Birmingham and died in Sheffield. ==References== ==External links== * Category:English landscape painters Category:19th-century English painters Category:1804 births Category:1886 deaths Category:Artists from Sheffield Category:People from Ecclesall
title: James Poole (painter)
